basics.name: Abu Adnan Sadi
basics.label: Engineer
basics.summary: An enthusiastic Computer Science and Engineering graduate with a keen interest in Deep Learning, Computer Vision, and NLP. Always seeking newer opportunities to apply my technical skills, collaborate with experts, and help make advancements in the field of AI.

work.name: Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering, North South University
work.summary: I am working under the supervision of Dr. Mohammad Ashrafuzzaman Khan. My main responsibility is working on artificial intelligence/natural language processing research projects (mainly designing, implementation, and paper writing) in the medical domain.

publications.name: LMFLOSS: A Hybrid Loss For Imbalanced Medical Image Classification.
An end-to-end pollution analysis and detection system using artificial intelligence and object detection algorithms
Visual Pollution Detection Using Google Street View and YOLO
